admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Financial Sector Adjustment
            Loan Project will support the Government's continuing
            financial sector adjustment program for 1988-89. The
            objectives of the program are : (1) to improve mobilization
            and allocation of funds and foster financial deepening
            through appropriate interest rates; (2) with regard to the
            banking system, to enhance it's ability to mobilize and
            allocate funds efficiently by fostering a competitive
            environment and financial discipline; and (3) with regard to
            the money and capital markets, to increase competition in
            the Government securities markets and to develop the
            secondary market for such securities. The loan will finance
            the cost of eligible private and public sector imports.
